results.title: Barbara Windsor, Beloved British TV and Film Star, Dies at 83
results.abstract: She went from bubbly sex symbol in the “Carry On” films to working-class hero on “EastEnders.” Her private life was often as troubled as her “EastEnders” character’s.

multimedia.caption: The actress Barbara Windsor at the British Academy Television Awards in London in 2009. She was a star of the series “EastEnders” on and off from 1994 to 2016.

results.title: Film Academy Museum Delays Its Opening Again
results.abstract: The Academy Museum of Motion Pictures pushed back its opening to Sept. 30, 2021, from April 30, citing the difficulty of forecasting when public life may begin to normalize.

Kim Ki-duk, Award-Winning South Korean Filmmaker, Dies at 59
results.abstract: He was celebrated for movies centered on society’s underbelly, but he was later accused of sexual misconduct. He died of Covid-19.
